MeasureCounter - Linux Installation
====================================

CONTENTS:
- MeasureCounter.vst3 (64-bit VST3 plugin)

DEPENDENCIES (Required):
Install these packages before using the plugin:

Ubuntu/Debian:
sudo apt-get install libasound2 libfreetype6 libx11-6 \
                     libxrandr2 libxinerama1 libxcursor1 \
                     libgl1-mesa-glx

Fedora/RHEL:
sudo dnf install alsa-lib freetype libX11 libXrandr \
                 libXinerama libXcursor mesa-libGL

Arch:
sudo pacman -S alsa-lib freetype2 libx11 libxrandr \
               libxinerama libxcursor mesa

INSTALLATION:

1. Create VST3 directory if it doesn't exist:
   mkdir -p ~/.vst3

2. Copy the plugin:
   cp -r MeasureCounter.vst3 ~/.vst3/

3. Restart your DAW or rescan plugins

SUPPORTED DAWS:
- Reaper
- Bitwig Studio
- Ardour
- Renoise
- And any DAW supporting VST3

ISSUES:
https://github.com/geissmannsbin/measure-counter-vst/issues
